:defaultOpenKeys.description: array with the keys of default opened sub menus
:defaultOpenKeys.description_zh: 初始展开的 SubMenu 菜单项 key 数组

:defaultSelectedKeys.description: array with the keys of default opened sub menus
:defaultSelectedKeys.description_zh: 初始选中的菜单项 key 数组

forceSubMenuRender.description: render submenu into DOM before it shows
forceSubMenuRender.description_zh: 在子菜单展示之前就渲染进 DOM

inlineCollapsed.description: specifies the collapsed status when menu is inline mode
inlineCollapsed.description_zh: inline 时菜单是否收起状态

:inlineIndent.description: indent px of inline menu item on each level
:inlineIndent.description_zh: inline 模式的菜单缩进宽度

mode.description: type of the menu; vertical, horizontal, and inline modes are supported
mode.description_zh: 菜单类型，现在支持垂直、水平、和内嵌模式三种

:openKeys.sync.description: array with the keys of currently opened sub menus
:openKeys.sync.description_zh: 当前展开的 SubMenu 菜单项 key 数组

v-model.description: array with the keys of currently selected menu items
v-model.description_zh: 当前选中的菜单项 key 数组

:subMenuCloseDelay.description: delay time to hide submenu when mouse leave, unit: second
:subMenuCloseDelay.description_zh: 用户鼠标离开子菜单后关闭延时，单位：秒

:subMenuOpenDelay.description: delay time to show submenu when mouse enter, unit: second
:subMenuOpenDelay.description_zh: 用户鼠标进入子菜单后开启延时，单位：秒

:overflowedIndicator.description: Customized icon when menu is collapsed
:overflowedIndicator.description_zh: 自定义 Menu 折叠时的图标

events.name: click
events.description: callback executed when a menu item is clicked
events.description_zh: 点击 MenuItem 调用此函数

events.name: deselect
events.description: callback executed when a menu item is deselected, only supported for multiple mode
events.description_zh: 取消选中时调用，仅在 multiple 生效

events.name: select
events.description: callback executed when a menu item is selected
